author: dcspark
title: Basic Plutus Voting dApp
description: DAOs in Cardano right now have no way to do smart contract powered voting
solution: We plan to create an open standard for on-chain voting through a Plutus smart contract that can be used by any DAO or dApp
experience: Our team is composed of well known ex-Emurgo and ex-IOHK employees who have been building the Cardano ecosystem for the past several years
